dublinCore.title: 113 HR 3053 IH: Healthcare for our Heroes Act
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Sinema (for herself and Mr. Roe of Tennessee) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the authority of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out the Department of Veterans Affairs Health Professional Scholarship Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Healthcare for our Heroes Act .

section.header: Extension of Department of Veterans Affairs Health Professional Scholarship Program
section.text: Section 7619 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking December 31, 2014 and inserting December 31, 2016.
